seo.title: Vernazza Camping 2025 | Campsites Near Cinque Terre
seo.description: Find campsites near Vernazza. Budget-friendly camping options with access to trails and the most beautiful village in Cinque Terre.

body.title: Camping near Vernazza
body.subtitle: Budget-friendly camping near Cinque Terre's most photogenic village. Outdoor accommodation with easy access to trails and the coast.

features.title: Basic Facilities
features.description: Tent pitches and bungalows near the village.

features.title: Trail Access
features.description: Walking distance to Cinque Terre hiking paths.

features.title: Clean Amenities
features.description: Hot showers, toilets, and laundry facilities.

features.title: Easy Transport
features.description: Short walk or bus ride to train station.

features.title: Hillside Settings
features.description: Most sites in olive groves above the coast.
